mcq.statement: Akbar's marriage with the princess of Amber was unique because:

options.a: a) The princess of Amber was not converted to Islam
options.b: It was the first marriage of the Rajput princess with a Mughal ruler
options.c: This was a voluntary alliance; different from the forced marriages of Muslim rulers with theRajput princesses
options.d: This marriage proved to be a cornerstone of the Mughal-Rajput alliance
